definitions.definition: (manner) In a serious or literal manner.
definitions.example: He was hoping that we would take him seriously.
That was a seriously unpleasant thing to say.

definitions.definition: Used to attempt to introduce a serious point in a less serious conversation
definitions.example: Now, seriously, why did you forget to feed the cat today?

definitions.definition: Used to call back to a previous point, either in disbelief or emphasis
definitions.example: You baked 10 cakes. Seriously, why did you do that?
